paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Adeniran et al. found that an N588K-hERG mutation in SQT1 initiates and maintains ventricular reentry.

functional_data.summary: The N588K mutation increases the generation of reentrant spiral waves and stabilizes scroll waves in anatomical three-dimensional (3D) ventricular tissue.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is associated with increased arrhythmia risk due to enhanced tissue vulnerability.
key_quotes: Adeniran et al. found that an N588K-hERG mutation in SQT1 initiates and maintains ventricular reentry.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in KCNH2 was found in the text.
